nick_stevenson.name: Nick Stevenson
nick_stevenson.excerpt: I have very fond memories of my time at the Nottingham New Theatre. I produced five shows at NNT, and the highlight of my first year was taking our production of Bed by Jim Cartwright to the Djanogly Theatre at Nottingham Lakeside Arts for a week-long run. I also thoroughly...

philip_geller.name: Philip Geller
philip_geller.excerpt: I thoroughly enjoyed my time at the Nottingham New Theatre. My highlight was probably co-ordinating the 4 shows we took one year to NSDF. Since graduating I have production managed two shows at the Edinburgh Fringe Festival. I now work as a Maths teacher in Manchester, but might return to...

will_pimblett.name: Will Pimblett
will_pimblett.excerpt: Having spent two years on committee and working on quite a number of shows it could be guessed I enjoyed my time at the New Theatre! During my time I oversaw investments made in the technical equipment of the theatre and worked on two shows taken to NSDF. Along with...
